動物用藥品名稱: 龍馬躍雞新城病、傳染性支氣管炎、產卵下降症不活化混合疫苗
業者名稱: 台灣龍馬躍股份有限公司
效能(適應症): 預防雞感染新城病、傳染性支氣管炎及產卵下降症。
ingredients: INACTIVATED INFECTIOUS BRONCHITIS VIRUS, MASS 41 STRAIN, TITRATINGPRIOR TO INACTIVAION AT LEAST 10^6.7EID50; INACTIVATED EGG DROPSYNDROME VIRUS, 127 STRAIN, TITRATING PRIOR TO INACTIVAION ATLEAST 10^6.0CCID50; INACTIVATED NEWCASTLE DISEASE VIRUS, ULSTER 2CSTRAIN, TITRATING PRIOR TO INACTIVAION AT LEAST 10^8.0EID50;MERTHIOLATE, AT MOST 0.015MG; OIL EXCIPIENT Q.S. 0.3ML.
